mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT LEVEL , v_query_bom.* , connect_by_isleaf AS status FROM v_query_bom v_query_bom START WITH v_query_bom.hcmaterialid = #{hcmaterialid} CONNECT BY ( PRIOR v_query_bom.cmaterialid ) = v_query_bom.hcmaterialid ) a WHERE status = 0

select bb_bom.cbomid bom_id, billmaker_user.user_name bill_maker, approver_user.user_name approver_user, bb_bom.bkititem kititem, bb_bom.fbillstatus bom_status, bb_bom.fbomtype bom_type, bb_bom.hcecnid ecn_id, bm_material.pk_material material_id, bm_material.code material_code, bm_material.name material_name, bm_material.materialspec material_spec, bb_bom.hfbomsource bom_source, bb_bom.hfversiontype version_type, bb_bom.hversion version, bb_bom.hbdefault bom_default, bb_bom.vbillcode bill_code --bb_bom.* from nc65.bd_bom bb_bom LEFT JOIN nc65.sm_user approver_user ON bb_bom.approver = approver_user.cuserid LEFT JOIN nc65.sm_user billmaker_user ON bb_bom.billmaker = billmaker_user.cuserid left join nc65.bd_material bm_material on bb_bom.hcmaterialid = bm_material.pk_material ${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT bom_id, (num*#{num}) num, base_num, b_material_id, b_material_code, b_material_name, sum(hand_num) hand_num, replace(wm_concat ( DISTINCT stor_name ), ',', '„ÄÅ') stor_name, b_material_spec, material_id, material_code, material_name, version FROM V_QUERY_BOM_ONHAND ${ew.sqlSegment} group by bom_id, num, base_num, b_material_id, b_material_code, b_material_name, b_material_spec, material_id, material_code, material_name, version order by b_material_code
